summary: Alice Pleasance Liddell  was a child friend of Charles Lutwidge Dodgson.
full_text: Alice Pleasance Liddell  inspired the children's classic Alice's Adventures in Wonderland by Lewis Carroll , when she asked him to tell her a story on a boating trip in Oxford. Liddell married the cricketer Reginald Hargreaves, and they had three sons.
title: Alice Pleasance Liddell
